sentence.text: Here, we sought to cellular response to interleukin-4 lncRNAs differentially regulated in cancer cells resistant to either negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II-related apoptosis-inducing ligand (positive regulation of apoptotic process) or the response to cytokine inhibitor UMI-77, agents that coenzyme A biosynthetic process through the extrinsic and intrinsic apoptotic pathways, respectively.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: Additionally, negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II was demonstrated to drive OVAAL transcription, indicating a positive feedback loop between c-Myc and OVAAL in controlling tumor growth.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: Taken together, these results reveal that OVAAL contributes to the survival of cancer cells through dual mechanisms controlling RAF/MEK/ERK signaling and proteasome regulatory particle assembly-mediated cell senescence
